## Context
Describe the technical context or problem that motivates this task.
Explain why this work is necessary from a maintainability, quality, or architectural perspective.

## Goal
Clearly state what this task aims to achieve.
Focus on the technical outcome rather than user-facing behavior.

## Scope
**In scope**
- List what is explicitly included in this task

**Out of scope**
- List what is explicitly excluded to avoid scope creep

## Technical Notes
Include any relevant technical decisions, tools, libraries,
or constraints that should be considered.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] The task is completed according to the defined goal
- [ ] Configuration works as expected in a clean setup
- [ ] No regressions or unintended side effects are introduced
- [ ] The solution follows project conventions
